content.raw: The issue is that 'H' had been a reserved symbol for the Hilbert transform operator, similar to 'd' for differentiation, 'integ', etc.  I think having it available as a variable/parameter outweighs the usefulness of this shortcut, though, so I've changed the Hilbert transform to use the full word 'Hilbert', and 'H' should now be available (4fbf7ad).
content.html: The issue is that 'H' had been a reserved symbol for the Hilbert transform operator, similar to 'd' for differentiation, 'integ', etc. I think having it available as a variable/parameter outweighs the usefulness of this shortcut, though, so I've changed the Hilbert transform to use the full word 'Hilbert', and 'H' should now be available (4fbf7ad).
